title: XSS in Carbon Footprint Calculator
description: Find and exploit an XSS vulnerability in a mock carbon footprint calculator to steal user data.

title: SQLi in Carbon-Credit Portal
description: Exploit a SQL Injection vulnerability in a mock carbon-credit trading portal to access the database.

title: Bypass Solar Panel Dashboard Login
description: Find a way to bypass the login mechanism of a Solar Panel Monitoring Dashboard.

title: Crack Energy-Efficient Cipher
description: Analyze and crack a custom 'energy-efficient cipher' with weak key rounds.

title: Break PoS Microgrid Ledger
description: Identify and exploit vulnerabilities in a blockchain-style Proof-of-Stake microgrid ledger.

title: Spot Illegal Logging Satellite Image
description: Examine satellite images for signs of manipulation and identify illegal logging activities.

title: Extract EXIF GPS from Rainforest Photos
description: Extract hidden EXIF GPS data from rainforest conservation photos to pinpoint a location.

title: Reverse Garbage Truck Routes Binary
description: Reverse engineer a stripped binary simulating garbage truck routes to find a hidden optimization.

title: Crack EV Charging Schedule Program
description: Analyze and crack an obfuscated program for EV charging schedules to manipulate charging times.

title: Buffer Overflow in Smart Irrigation
description: Find and exploit a buffer overflow vulnerability in a Smart Irrigation Controller.

title: Track Fake Eco-Fund
description: Use OSINT techniques to track down a fake eco-fund using WHOIS and DNS footprints.
